idea-plugin.name: Base16 Dracula
idea-plugin.vendor: Mike Barkmin (http://github.com/mikebarkmin) based on Dracula Theme (http://github.com/dracula), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Dracula for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Mike Barkmin (http://github.com/mikebarkmin) based on Dracula Theme (http://github.com/dracula). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
